The game is really fun but relies on this EXTREMELY SHITTY LOBBY SYSTEM TO GET GAMES STARTED!!! TO WHOEVER DEVELOPED THIS GAME - DROP THE 90S STYLE MULTIPLAYER AND JUST FORCE PEOPLE TO PLAY.  STOP WITH THE READY OPTION!  People come in and out constantly and dont hit ready and its insanely annoying.  Just force the game to start.  Also matches are made and the LAG IS TERRIBLE!  The netcode in this game is SCARIER THAN THE GAME ITSELF!  You will be more AFRIAD OF TIMING OUT than getting KILLED the netcode is so BAD!  If the lobby was abolished in this game I would give it a A+ without that have to give it a C minus.  Feels like Beta Dog Poop at the current Steam pricing.  I don't like eating dog feces and this game make me feel like I'm chugging it with the terrible net performance and lobby wait times!!!

Das Spiel ist mein lieblings Spiel geworden!

Dead by Daylight ist ungefähr so wie der Film "Freitag der 13". Also wer den Film kennt weiß bescheid :). Das Spiel macht einfach rießen Spaß und ist sehr nerven kitzelnt. Es ist sehr spannend als Überlebender sowohl als Killer.

Ich würde mir aber noch sehr gerne wünschen, dass es eine Option gibt wo man mit seinem Freund gemeinsam in fremde Lobbys joinen kann. Es ist zielmisch mühsam 1 Stunde mit seinem Freund versuchen in einer gleichen Lobby zu kommen.

Ansonsten bestes Spiel! <3

Finally someone came out with this game.  I had this idea years ago.  Just a little twist on it though.  Feel free to add this in future development.  Large house.  Home invasion.  Get to a phone 911 = cops.  You can play as a cop.  Doesn't mean you are going to win, just that you show up.  Just an idea.  Survivor (s), home invader (s), cop (s) responding to the call with no idea what is going on.  Could add multiple killers on different maps.  Large houses, mansions, castles, grave yards.  Take a map right out of Phantasm.  The possibilities are endless.  Thanks for bringing my dream to life.  Great game so far.  I hope this gets developed with the same level of care that payday 2 had.  The developers really patched the shit out of that game. I am truly disturbed.  That is how I know it is good.

Well is a good game and idea? Yeah

Is it poorly made and needs polished out? Fuck yeah. This game is such a pathetic excuse for a modern game that seems as it had a good dev team behind it. The bugs and optimization are laughable.
I can play ARMA 3 on ultra or high, and I have to tone this down to medium graphic settings. (A game with a lot less to render.)

When downed sometimes as a survivor I bug out to where no fellow or murderer can interact with me so I just bleed out.
Load time can sometimes be attrocious. Just because I've heard "Someone's internet is bad".

Gameplay issue (probably general logic fails on their part)? 
--When crawling around you can hold your left mouse button to "recover" yet you get it up to 95% and you need help....then what was the point of that again? 
--Flashlight is only slightly bugged when you have it pointed at the killers head and it doesn't blind him.
--Lol this one is funny, I've gotten good skill checks out of the allowed skill check area, I've gotten bads one that I swore was right on the line of the "Great" area.
--It's fucking 2016.....and no voice chat....hell it's pathetic we don't even get proximity chat....in a fucking game so reliant on team work...that also kills some of the imersion some might get from screaming at your team mates to "Not come save me he's watching me from a distance." 


Am I gonna keep it? Sadly yes, just so I can kill my favorite streamer. Is it worth it? Only on sale, I'm sure there is loads more bugs as I've see them on streams I just can't remember them all.

It's hard to recommend this game to friends...Especially when I can't join a lobby with them. At the moment, the game seems unfinished and grasping on the hopes of people's expectations for them to add a working party system. The problem with this is I can't review parts of a game that have not been released so...As for now I will do the pro's and con's list of the released portions of the game:

PRO'S:
-Fun multiplayer
-Expansive perk/loot system
-Rewarded for working with teammates
-Challanging and refreshing gameplay experience.
-Instant matches as a Survivor

CONS:
-Lack of a party system
-Lack of a matchmaking balancing system
-Problematic for new players to be anywhere close to the same level as experienced players. What I mean by this is that of course you will have an advantage by playing the game more, but in this game, the disadvantage is far too great to make it fun for a new player.
-Toxic Community. Again, during my 3-4 hours played, I experienced some of the most hateful and mean people I've ever played with. Be prepared to be called,'baddie' or 'scrub' for simply not being a level 5+ character or above.
-Leveling individual characters. I can understand leveling Killers and leveling survivors, but each character in each category? This is simply to add more of a grind feeling to the game and it actually distances me from the game.
- Wait times as a Killer. I've tried the killer 3 times and it took me 10+ minutes for each time I played. This is unacceptable in a game released in 2016.

THE VERDICT:

    While this game exemplifies some amazing and refreshing new gameplay, the problems with it's matchmaking and balancing simply make the game unenjoyable past the first hour of the game.

Played sufficiently enough and I love the game. Adrenaline junkies out there this is the game for you. It's got all kinds of things to offer for both competitive and casual players. 
Now for the dirt though: Personally I think this game should still be labeled as BETA.  There are way too many bugs to consider this a full release.  I'd list the bugs but then we'd be here all day. The Devs are wonderful and working hard but it was too soon to release this game as a full. 
I'd say this game is 3/5 currently but if they can fix the bugs this game will be easy 6/5 play it 24/7 status.  Overall, get the game still, the bugs are numerous but the game itself is just too fun despite the bugs. Once the bugs are fixed and playing with friends are added then this game is hugely fun.

EDIT1: With the survive with friends now available to rank players, this game has become infinitely more fun.  Despite the matchmaking, it has made surviving easier now that you have that communication with your friends, be it in steam chat or off client server chats.  that communication gives survivors a hidden advantage despite survivors being nerfed not only in terms of perks but in terms of juking the killer. 
There are still bugs and yes as i said, you may still have unfair matches of all rank 20 survivors versus a rank 10^ killer, but the game changer is the play with friends. It used to be I get shit on and die so quick thanks to strangers leadin the killer to me while i am sabotaging but with friends, they lead the killer NOT in my direction and we  all typically win.  
This game is definitely worth grabbing and when more players join this game I am sure they will make a more solid rank matchmaking system where the matches will be more fair.   Get this game even if you don't have friends: you may make a friend or two from this game.

EDIT2: With the new Last breath chapter, the survivors are seeing a collection of nerfs and killers are getting buffed. It has come to a point basically where hiding from the killer will be near impossible without some high coordination and high end perks. It is really frustrating as well that the game still has not done anything to punish killers for camping hooks. It is impossible to save a friend if a killer does not move after hooking you. the killer can just afk there and know that you cannot be saved. Also the trapper in the game has an addon that instantly downs survivors that step in it which is a problem should he put it under you if you are hooked.  no one can save you unless they sacrifice themselves but then technically that means someone is still being sacrificed. The new perks for the nurse on top of the general perks makes it impossible to dodge the vision of the killer and it practically demands that you have to be faster than the killer to avoid him.  The new update even brought in more bugs as well and survive with friends might as well be thrown out the window. You can queue with your friends for 30 minutes and when a match is found you DON'T actually get in with your friends as someone gets thrown out and replaced with a random.  This is even more frustrating since they removed the icons on top of the survivors that shows their names and rank. I am ok with rank being hidden but the names is something that needs to come back cuz we want to know if we are playing with our friends or with a random.  

EDIT 3: with the fixes to campers and queuing, this game is now worth it. Ranking system is a bit flawed but with the game design it will not matter. this game is still great for those who crave the adrenaline and this game is fun with friends (obviously). not to mention cosmetics are now available to  the killer finally (if limited).

Dead by Daylight: Four survivors try and activate 5 generators scattered across a level in order to restore the power to the exit gates. All the while they are being hunted by one of three killers who have to incapacitate and place survivors on sacrificial hooks scattered about the level. Survivors view in 3rd person and detect the killer based on vicinity. Killers view in 1st person and detect survivors based on direct line of sight within a certain distance straight ahead. Survivors running is slightly slower than the Killer's base speed. When a survivor is hit, they get an initial adrenaline burst of speed. Survivors are typically running, walking, or crouching about bushes and trees. Killers dash around the map, patrolling generators. Survivors being chased can use the environment to escape their hunter. Such options are: knocking debris behind them, forcing the killer to either go around, get hit and stunned, or break the obstacle; jumping through windows (which can be done quietly if you aren't sprinting); and hiding inside closets (crows appear atop the closet if you stay too long). Certain actions are loud and alert the killer to where they occured. There are a few spots where the killer has no hope of getting you, but it is balanced in that you aren't being productive while being a troll, so it's fine. This game has ridiculous strategy involved. You need to change your playstyle depending on who is hunting you or who you are playing as. The Wraith has a bell that he rings to turn invisible, though it takes time. The Hillbilly has a chainsaw that, when charged, allows him to dash at an incredible speed until he hits something. THe trapper uses bear traps around the map. There are a few items survivors can equip before games to change the way they play. Someone with a medkit may stop repairing a generator and prioritize healing themself or others. The flashlight may make you more likely to act heroically, as if the killer is carrying someone and is blinded by light, the killer will be stunned and drop his victim. The map sucks. The toolbox is amazing but rare. It lets you either repair generators faster, or dismantle two or three hooks. The skeleton key allows you to escape a bit earlier through the hatch. The hatch is an alternative escape option made available once there are two or less generators, and you're the last alive. It is difficult to find, but once in vicinity you'll hear an obvious sound. Buy this game.

Dead by Daylight 4vs1 bir survival oyunu. Oyundaki amacınız oynadığınız kişiye/şeye göre değişiyor. 2 tane seçeneğiniz var : Be a Killer ya da Be a Survivor. Survivor seçeneğini seçerseniz 4 tane karakter karşınıza çıkıyor. Hoşunuza gideni seçip oynuyorsunuz. Survivor olarak amacınız 5 jeneratörü tamir edip çıkış kapılarını açıp kaçmak. Tabii sizi engelleyecek bir şey var. Bu durumda Killer geliyor. Eğer killer olmayı seçerseniz 3 farklı killer türü var. Bunların birisi görünmez oluyor, diğeri ayı tuzakları kuruyor ve sonuncusu ise testeresiyle koşturuyor. Bu killerlar adı üzerine survivorları yakalayıp öldürmeye çalışıyor. Yakaladığı zaman direk ölmüyorsunuz kaçmak için şansınız var. Gerek diğer survivorlar sizi kurtarabilir, gerek killer'ın sırtındayken kaçabilirsiniz gerek killer'ın sizi astığı kancalardan kaçabilirsiniz. Can barınız 0'ı bulana kadar ölmüş olmuyorsunuz.Ek olarak size + özellikler kazandıran perkler var. Seviye aldıkça bunlar açılacak. Oyunda her şey bloodweb adında bir şeye kurulu. Oyunda kazandığınız bloodpointleri burada harcıyorsunuz ve bunlar size yeni perkler, yeni addonlar, yeni itemler ve offeringler kazandırıyor. Perkler dışında kullanacağınız şeyler öldüğünüzde gidiyor. Offeringler oyunda ölseniz de ölmeseniz de gidiyor. Gayet basit bir oyun gibi gözükse de aslında değil. Almanızı tavsiye ederim alt tarafa kısa olarak + ve - leri yazıyorum son olarak.

+ Size killer ya da survivor iken ek özellikler sağlayan perkler
+ Karakterlerinizi düzenleyebilme (Daha eklenecek çok şeyi var ancak şu an için bir şeyler var)
+ İyi grafikler
+ Survivorken herkes öldüğünde bir tek siz kaldığınız zaman Black Lock adı verilen bir yer açılıyor. Burayı bulursanız jeneratörleri tamamlamanıza gerek kalmadan kaçabiliyorsunuz

- Arkadaşlarınız ile aynı odaya giremiyorsunuz. Girmek için quick play'den ya da join a game'den pek çok kez tıklama yapmanız gerekiyor. Aynı odaya düşerseniz oynayabilirsiniz. (Private olarak oynayabiliyorsunuz ancak hiçbir şey kazanamıyorsunuz. Arkadaşlarla oynama özelliği getireceklerini söylüyorlar.)
- Bazen çeşitli buglar oluyor. (Lobiye girememek gibi)
- Killer'ları yavaşlatmak için düşürdüğünüz tahta parçalarını tam köşeden kapatmalısınız. Yoksa killer'ın önüne düşüyorsunuz.
8/10

At first I claimed to despise this game but then they released their first bit of DLC for free.

 That was impressive so I changed my review.

Basicamente es un juego de pura superviviencia, sin tus compañeros se complica mucho la cosa. Ademas debo admitir que tiene un pedaso de ambientación la verdad. Lo recomiendo, son partidas rapidas dependiendo del instinto de supervivencia que tengas y la destreza para escapar del asesino. Muy bueno aunque con algunos bugs pero nada que no se pueda remediar.

Edito el analisis: Todo muy bien, todo correcto pero hay un pequeño fallo nada mas y es que se hace imposible jugar partidas sin gente que tenga rango o nivel, se esta volviendo en puro juego en equipo y si, por una parte lo comprendo y pillo el concepto de 4 supervivientes y no 1 o 2. A parte no se porque se les paso por la cabeza quitar algunas ventanas, es decir no hacen nada para remediar a los camperos de los ganchos pero si por hacerrnos a los supervivientes las partidas imposibles y ademas si cuesta ya de por si que el superviviente se escape del asesino para colmo le meten una habilidad que tienes que estar 15 mint (sin exagerar, ojo la habilidad al rango maximo) dandole al A+D hasta undir las teclas. Cosas así si por mi fuera deberian de echarle un ojo porque de verdad en los primeros dias me encanto pero actualmente me esta empezando a aburrir, de 4 partidas, ganamos 1 o 2 y las demas a puro pleno el asesino con las muertes. Me encanta, un pedaso de ambientacion, hermoso modo de juego y si hago este tipo de critica es sabiendo del tema.

Bonjour,

Quelques lignes afin d'aiguiller de potentiels joueurs alergiques à la langue de Shakespeare...

Le bilan après quelques heures de jeu :

Points positifs :

- Ambiance bien malsaine, adaptée au jeu ;
- Environements flippants ;
- Doit tourner sur pas mal de bécannes au vu des graphismes .

Points négatifs :

- Cette impression d'avoir fait le tour des possibilités du jeu après seulement quelques heures.
- Je m'attendais à beaucoup plus de subtilité. En bref, on court, on fait le lapin, on se fait embrocher... Un jeu de ce type gagnerait à être plus posé... Ca ressemble plus à une course poursuite incohérente qu'à un de nos bons vieux films d'horreur...
- Une seule type de planque ?! Vous êtes sérieux...
- Pas de possibilité de discuter lors des parties... A quoi bon ? Pourquoi ne pas avoir implémenté un chat vocal intéragisseant avec le jeu (nos discutions ou du moins un son...pourraient être repérées par le tueur, nous obligeant à parler tout bas... à nous taire lorsque celui-ci est à proximité)... Rien de tout cela, pas même un chat écrit...
- Un seul type d'objectif, quelque soit l'archétype...
- Aucune cohérence de gameplay : Vous vous faites attraper et 9 fois sur 10, le tueur vous empale et attend gentillement que vous creviez (impossibilité de vous sauver... d'ailleurs à quoi bon, vu que les autres joueurs en profitent pour vite retaper les générateurs).
- Graphisme techniquement datés (perso cela ne me gène pas mais pour les afficionados des gtx980 et autres Fury, ne vous attendez pas à faire chauffer votre carte graphique).

Bref, on tourne vite en rond... A voir si ils étoffent le jeu... Pour l'instant, l'idée et l'ambiance sont bonnes... Pour le reste, c'est lamentable...

Si vous vous attendiez comme moi à revivre un Vendredi 13 ou un massacre à la tronconneuse (avec toutes les subtilités que cela implique) , passez votre chemin, c'est limite du run and die...


Le concept est bon, hype et fait vendre... Mais le jeu est loin d'être bon en l'état... On frôle l'ébauche de jeu en béta, avec 3-4 trucs à faire et encore...

J'ai d'ailleurs demandé pour la toute première fois sur Steam, un remboursement après quelques heures de jeu... En espèrant que Steam fasse preuve de clémence et d'esprit commercial envers un humble vieux gamer ;-)

(Avis tout à fait subjectif)

[h1] Very Good Fun, But Beware (see cons at bottom) [/h1]


***Update on Points and Ranking System***
The game needs a lot more thought and attention. It's perfectly possible to sacrifice every single survivor in a match and not earn enough points even to maintain your current rank. It's ridiculous!


Dead by Daylight (DBD) is a brilliantly fun and engrossing multiplayer game that thrusts you into a true heart-pounding killer versus survivors horror experience.

You can choose to play either as one of three distinctive killers (each with their own special ability/skill/item) or as one of the four human victims whose sole job it is to escape the arena in which one of these killers is hunting them relentlessly. As a survivor, part of the beauty of the game is not knowing which of the three killers the opposing player has chosen until you come into close proximity of him for the first time during the match.

The killer wins the match by murdering at least one of the victims (killing all four gives an even better victory and yields a lot more points to be spent in upgrading the character), and a survivor wins a match by escaping the nightmarish human sacrifice game into which they’ve been thrust.

To escape the team of four survivors must reactivate 5 of the broken-down generators littered throughout the map to supply the power to open the sealed exit to freedom. To be successful, the killer needs to do everything possible to prevent this from happening.

A unique aspect of the game is that you play the killer from a first-person perspective with a relatively narrow field of view (this cannot be adjusted from the options menu, much to the annoyance and discomfort of some players). Conversely, you play one of the survivors from a third-person perspective. This can be quite disorientating at first, but you’ll soon get used to the shifting perspectives as you change between playing the hunter and the hunted. The idea of this is to give the survivors an observational advantage to evade the killer stealthily, and to limit the killer’s ability to locate them. Careful observation is key for success in finding or in not being found. Seeing as stealth and evasion are the survivors’ only means of defence the killer would be completely overpowered without this somewhat controversial handicap.
To compensate for the murderer's restricted vision, the character has heightened hearing that visually indicates the origin of noises on screen. Did a survivor just fail to repair a generator successfully? Then the killer will be able to pinpoint the position of the resulting electrical explosion from anywhere else on the map. Woe betide any survivor who remains in that area trying to fix the generator anew. 

The cat and mouse style of game play can be so tense under these life and death circumstances that it’s bound to raise anyone’s heart rate while providing a fun and satisfying experience.


One of my biggest gripes with DBD is that there’s no reward for being a stealthy survivor who eludes the killer - even if you are eventually caught and sacrificed. I’ve been the last remaining survivor in quite a number of matches, and have had to spend a lot of time carefully sneaking around the map, avoiding detection, and completing the survival objectives. Over 20 very patient minutes later I’m eventually caught and killed. But then – and this is the truly galling part - I’ve got absolutely nothing to show for all the hard work, effort, and skill.

My biggest issue with the game is that, on occasions, killers will spawn far too close to one of more of the survivors. Because of this you can be found and killed very quickly even if you’re hiding behind good cover, you haven’t done anything to attract the killer’s attention, and you’re nowhere near any one of the generators (at the start of a match a good killer will make a beeline for the nearest generators).



[b] PROS [/b]

+ Very engaging game play that rewards good teamwork.
+ Excellent chilly and foreboding environments that add good depth to the atmosphere.
+ Great sound assets and music that add to the suspense and the horror.
+ It’s great fun to play as both a survivor and a killer.
+ Each killer has their unique flavour, which affects the play-style, that adds lots of re-playability value if you enjoy being the murderer.
+ The more you achieve in a match (killing survivors, activating motors, escaping the map, etc.), the more points you earn, and the closer you come to unlocking and being able to use good upgrades. The upgrades with which you’re presented are procedurally generated.
+ An immensely satisfying experience when you finally escape the clutches of the lurking evil, or when you sacrifice all the souls of the condemned.


[b] CONS [/b]

- YOUT WILL GET STUCK ON INVISIBLE BARRIERS, AND THEN BE SEEN AND CAUGHT BY THE KILLER.
- The game is unbalanced because survivors can keep cheesing it through windows and the killer will never be able to catch them.
- Relatively basic graphics. Especially certain player animations.
- Game play bugs that include temporary invisible barriers, and survivors getting stuck on rocks and trees when crouching to hide behind them from the killer. Also, buttons don’t always trigger their intended actions – quite often you’ll need to press ctrl a couple of time before you character actually crouches.
- Unless you have amazing team mates then the matches seem to be balanced in favour of the killer.
- Connectivity issues. You’ll be disconnected quite often when trying to join a lobby. Even if you join successfully everyone may be disconnected before the game play itself begins.
- The ranking and points system. It truly is difficult to gain enough points to maintain your current rank let alone to earn enough to progress up to a higher rank. Additionally, it’s all-too easy to lose enough points to be demoted to a lower tier. Two examples: as a killer, if you do everything perfectly you only just gain enough points to progress. As a survivor, you need to do a vast amount of work not to be shunted down to a lower level.
- As with any other online multiplayer game, the quality of the players heavily determines the quality of your game play experience. If you’re a survivor who’s put into a match with people who have no idea what to do, or who just act like idiots, then your chance of survival drops dramatically. If you’re a skilled player, who manages to evade the killer’s sights for long enough, you’ll still be left with a heck of a lot of work to do that almost guarantees your death as well.
- Players continually jump servers and end up wasting your time while you’re waiting for a match to begin.
- No indication of ping when you’ve joined a lobby, so you could end up in a match with terrible lag and ridiculous rubber-banding. You can leave, but the game will penalise you for quitting – it will effectively count your leaving as a defeat when it comes to scoring and ranking.


[b] What We Need [/b]

- A reward system for stealthy survivors.
- Bugs fixing. Especially invisible barriers and issues that cause you to get stuck on rocks and trees.
- Some system that prevents the killer from catching you within the first 20 seconds of a match! Who wants to wait over 10 minutes to play a game that lasts a mere fraction of that time?
Killers need to spawn a reasonable distance away from the survivor spawn points.


In conclusion, Dead by Daylight is an immensely fun and surprisingly immersive multiplayer game to play. No other game has had my heart pounding and racing quite like this one has. However, due to its current bugs and somewhat rough presentation it does feel like an early access title at times.

As always, I’ll be updating this review when relevant, and feel free to leave me questions below.
Until then my killer looks forward to sacrificing you to the demonic overlord...

Hard to be the killer, especially when you are against people like me that are good at hiding/juking. As long as you do good, you won't get de-ranked. Game is really fun and really get's your heart pumping playing as a survivor. 

- Survivor Pro Tip
If the killer has decent headphones he can hear where you went if you escape his grasp, do not go into a closet right next to him. lol

- Killer Pro Tip
Listen, listen, listen. Hearing crows fly away, grass moving, or a survivors cry's can really get you places.



Edit: I have come to find out that it is easy as hell to be a Killer since the Killer hosts the game. They need to compensate for this. Maybe getting rid of the run trails or something. I think it will be better once they implement joining friends so you can communicate. Voice chat would also be handy.

Edit 2: Now you get stuck on objects if you crouch next to them. This makes it even easier for killers to catch you......Killers keep getting easier and easier and surviving is becoming more difficult.......This game has so much potential but until they fix these issues I won't be playing. At least not survivor.

Edit 3: The new update, err I mean "DLC" is good. But the way they are advertising it as a DLC is making me question their intentions.
Jogo muito bom, rodo no ultra e com apenas 4gb de ram sem lag. Muito divertido. Recomendo!

遊戲的內容,設計概念都很不錯,但是P2P的連線品質差到一極致的水平,配對系統也非常差,老手,菜鳥都放在一起,而且還有一大堆bug和外掛,另外評分系統 Rank 也是一大缺點,鼓勵玩家跳game中離遊戲,而且更新檔,也沒切中重點,問題依然存在。但終歸連線品質才是最大問題,走場都用飄 不斷回溯,明明轉彎了,卻突然臉撞牆根本玩不到

簡單來說低成本製作所出現的問題,全部都有,但是遊戲玩法的設計其實很好

換個角度說,如果另一間大公司,製作相似的遊$,把bug都修補好,把連線品質做好,把配對系統做好 就算花4倍的價錢我也會願意買來玩
